columnTypes.name: Text
columnTypes.description: A column that stores alphanumeric characters, such as names or notes.

columnTypes.name: Number
columnTypes.description: A column that stores numeric values, including integers and decimals.

columnTypes.name: DateTime
columnTypes.description: A column that stores calendar dates, useful for tracking time-related data.

columnTypes.name: Boolean
columnTypes.description: A column that stores true/false values, typically used for flags or binary conditions.
